articles.title: Russia's Nationwide Paid Holiday Comes Into Effect To Curb Covid - NDTV
articles.description: New coronavirus restrictions came into effect across Russia on Saturday with authorities looking to stem soaring infections and deaths in Europe's worst hit country by fatalities.
articles.content:
Just 32.5% of Russia's population have been fully vaccinated (File)
Moscow: New coronavirus restrictions came into effect across Russia on Saturday with authorities looking to stem soaring infection… [+1641 chars]
